title: Plain English in a familiar conference betwixt three friends, Rusticus, Civis, and Veridicus, concerning the deadness of our markets : offer'd as an expedient to serious consideration, and for the general good of gentry and commons.
author: Culpeper, Thomas, Sir, 1626-1697.
publisher: Printed by T.J. and are to be sold by Henry Million,
notes: Attribured to Thomas Culpeper--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
